pageProps.title: I use linux
pageProps.description: This is the reason why i use linux
pageProps.content:
Why do i use linux.

I use linux cause it gives much better performance than windows its better for development imo

Customization

You can customize pretty much everything in linux from desktop to package manager to theme.

Opensource

I really like that linux is opensource making it the perfect for people who want to tool around with the operating system.

Distros

Theres a distro for everyone take for example archlinux its a minimal distro which is what i really like. But theres also distro such as popOs which aim to be really user friendly and are achieving this very well,
